meta_data.description: 1550 Sq. Ft. - Rent 2 BHK Apartment / Flat in Jaypee Greens Star Court, Jaypee Greens, Greater Noida * 15 Property & locality photos * Semifurnished * - 16th floor (out of 19). View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description: This 2 bhk flat in jaypee greens is available in jaypee greens star court for rent, one of the most prominent projects for residential flats in greater noida. Additionally, this property is in vicinity to important points of interest and is close to metro station, close to school, close to hospital and close to market. Property has attached 3 bathrooms & 1 balcony with 2 rooms . The flat is built on 1550 sq.Ft. Area. Ease of access to 1 covered parking within society. This flat is situated at 16th in a tower with 19 floors. This is a 10+ years old society. This is a semi-Furnished flat. Furnishing options provided - 5 light, 2 fan, 3 ac, 2 wardrobe and 2 geyser. The flat will be available from fri, 31 oct 2025 for families, single men and single women on any agreement type with a notice of 1 month for a duration of 11 months. We are demanding  40,000 for this unmatched property. Tenants have to pay society charges additionally like maintenance charges of  13000 monthly directly.  80000 amount to be paid to book this flat. Rent quoted excludes electricity & water charges. Refundable security deposit of  80000 to be paid for finalising the option. The property comes with reserved parking, feng shui / vaastu compliant, piped-Gas, intercom facility, power back-Up, water storage and high ceiling height all inclusive in one. Jaypee greens star court is designed very well to provide modern facilities such as swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, lift(s), maintenance staff, water softening plant and shopping centre. You would also like to know that the property also features rain water harvesting, no open drainage around, corner property, pet friendly, wheelchair friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Full. The flat faces east. Marble is used in the floor throughout the residence.
